clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Used in the management of open angle glaucoma PMID 12480285

incompatibilities.description: The excretion of Befunolol can be decreased when combined with Methimazole
The serum concentration of Befunolol can be increased when it is combined with Escitalopram
The metabolism of Befunolol can be decreased when combined with Dronedarone
Lasmiditan may increase the bradycardic activities of Befunolol
The serum concentration of Befunolol can be increased when it is combined with Givosiran
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Verapamil is combined with Befunolol
The serum concentration of Befunolol can be increased when it is combined with Ranolazine
Befunolol may increase the sympathomimetic activities of Formoterol
The serum concentration of Magnesium can be decreased when it is combined with Befunolol
The serum concentration of Befunolol can be increased when it is combined with Haloperidol
The serum concentration of Befunolol can be increased when it is combined with Fluoxetine
The serum concentration of the active metabolites of Befunolol can be increased when Befunolol is used in combination with Octreotide
